description.value:
The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Stench. Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a [[/save con 14 format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.
